name: Half-Hour Shooter 2
description:
Based on a game I made in half an hour, this game is one where you, a blue circle, run from red enemies. The amount of enemies spawned is your score. Use WASD or the arrow keys to move. Sorry, only currently available for Windows. Comment if you want a version for a different OS. 

Don't expect to have fun for more than a few minutes with this game, by the way. I want you to have the correct expectations for this.
